query.description: 디지털자재인식 시스템 거래명세서 번호생성을 위한 데이타 조회
query.statement: SELECT MANDT, INVNR, INVITEM, RDATE_P, RECE_DATE, RECE_TIME, DEL_DATE, DEL_TIME, EBELN, EBELP, POSID, POST1, POTYPE, EKGRP, KNTTP, PSTYP, WERKS, WERKS_TXT, LGORT, LGOBE, MATNR, MAKTX, GROES, ZEINR, MENGE, MEINS, EINDT, LIFNR, NAME1, INFNR, NETPR, WAERS, EXTWG, UDATE, EDATE, ETIME, VALUE, CHAR1, CHDAT, CHTIM, INS_Q, SDATE, STIME, DDATE, DTIME, MBLNR, MBLPO, BUDAT, IN_DT, IN_TM, STO_MBLNR, STO_MBLPO, CA_DT, CA_TM, PRO_F, FIELD, CR_DAT, CR_TIM, QM_CHK, USABIL, B_MENGE, USNAM, QM_CID, QM_CIDTXT, MBLNR2, MBLPO2, BUDAT2, OU_DT, OU_TM, CAN_MBLNR, CAN_MBLPO, CA_DT1, CA_TM1, CA_DT2, CA_TM2, BOX_CK, INVTAG, QR_YN FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT017 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND INVNR = #INVNR#
